post.body: i'm totally there next week.
6 or 7 ish?
in a bit. Finishing up drinks
for a little while longer
bryan and i are at barrage on the way to NWS soon
i'll have to pass on this outing. this weekend has been a weekend of R&R...recoup and relaxation...ya'll have fun!
that would be delightful...
i hope thats a euphemism for something
...and they would be spot on. Kudos!
in for the evening. Will rejoin the world twrw :)
you would be good to remember that, too. Lets not get started...
only the best drama series NBC ever produced.
i think for plot 'gunman' was the best. As far as episode as a whole, acting included, i'm still all for 'two cathedrals'
true. But there are some good episopes. I take it, 'in the shadow...gunman'?
and what episode is that?
i want hot cocoa!
ha. Without me? Jealous.
its past their bedtime.
wait what?
Grad school apps? to where?! Maybe..Columbia?
my favorite subject. Have fun! :)
glad you made it safely. :)
ha absolutely not!
Jst witnessed a fight btw the homeless at 103
Does not like wind, esp when its strong enough to move his hair with the amount of product in it.
Aw! Happy Anniversary, boys! :)
Is pleased that Grease finally posted their closing notice tonight.
Is Broadway-bound for the next two days. Seeing August/County tonight and 39 Steps tmrw. Oh...what. a. life! Ha.
Is deathly exhausted...not good.
Jst met paige davis
Is wondering how after 64 degree weather yesterday, it can be snowing today. The weather needs to pull it together.
was slightly more drunkles than he anticipated last night, still probably is, and is now, not by choice, in Blair Waldorf-mode.
